Deprecated API

  • Classes
  • Methods

  • Classes
    Class Description
    com.restfb.types.ads.AdCampaignGroup
    use {@see Campaign} instead
    com.restfb.types.ads.AdGroup
    use Ad instead
    com.restfb.types.ads.AdTag
    with Marketing API version 2.4 use AdLabel instead
    com.restfb.types.send.ListTemplatePayload
    with Graph API 4.0 this is no longer supported
    com.restfb.types.send.OpenGraphTemplatePayload
    with Graph API 4.0 this is no longer supported
    com.restfb.types.StatusMessage
    removed after Graph API 2.0
    com.restfb.types.User.Education
    since breaking change on 4 April, 2018
    com.restfb.types.webhook.PageConversation
    for 3.3+ directly and for all other versions on December 31, 2019. Use the Messenger Webhook instead
    com.restfb.types.WorkExperience
    since breaking change on 4 April, 2018
  • Methods
    Method Description
    com.restfb.BinaryAttachment.with​(String, InputStream)
    use the stream-less API passing a byte[] for data
    com.restfb.BinaryAttachment.with​(String, InputStream, String)
    use the stream-less API passing a byte[] for data instead
    com.restfb.BinaryAttachment.with​(String, String, InputStream)
    use the stream-less API passing a byte[] for data
    com.restfb.BinaryAttachment.with​(String, String, InputStream, String)
    use the stream-less API passing a byte[] for data
    com.restfb.types.Account.addPerm​(String)
    since graph api v3.1, use Account.addTask(java.lang.String) instead
    com.restfb.types.Account.getPerms()
    since graph api v3.1, use getTasks() instead
    com.restfb.types.Account.removePerm​(String)
    since graph api v3.1, use Account.removeTask(java.lang.String) instead

    com.restfb.types.ads.AdAccount.setUserRole​(String)

    use FacebookType.getId() instead

    use FacebookType.getId() instead
    com.restfb.types.Event.getIsViewerAdmin()
    since January 30, 2018
    com.restfb.types.Event.getLocation()
    with API version 2.3, use place field instead
    com.restfb.types.Event.getVenue()
    with API version 2.3, use Event.getPlace() field instead
    com.restfb.types.Event.getVenueList()
    with API version 2.3, use Event.getPlace() instead
    com.restfb.types.Event.setIsViewerAdmin​(Boolean)
    since January 30, 2018
    com.restfb.types.Event.setLocation​(String)
    with API version 2.3, use place field instead
    com.restfb.types.Event.setVenue​(Location)
    with API version 2.3, use Event.getPlace() field instead
    com.restfb.types.Event.setVenueList​(List<Location>)
    with API version 2.3, use Event.getPlace() instead

    use verificationStatus instead

    use verificationStatus instead
    com.restfb.types.Photo.getPosition()
    Facebook will start returning 0 for this field starting on October 3, 2012.
    com.restfb.types.Photo.getSource()
    Use images field instead
    com.restfb.types.Photo.setPosition​(Integer)
    Facebook will start returning 0 for this field starting on October 3, 2012.
    com.restfb.types.Photo.setSource​(String)
    Use images field instead

    com.restfb.types.webhook.messaging.MessageItem.getSeq()
    https://messengerblog.com/platform-updates/introducing-messenger-platform-v1-3-and-new-ways-to-drive-the-conversation/ "Developers who previously relied on using seq ID for deduping can use mid instead, and those who were using it for ordering purposes can use timestamp instead."
    com.restfb.types.webhook.messaging.MessageItem.setSeq​(Long)
    https://messengerblog.com/platform-updates/introducing-messenger-platform-v1-3-and-new-ways-to-drive-the-conversation/ "Developers who previously relied on using seq ID for deduping can use mid instead, and those who were using it for ordering purposes can use timestamp instead."

  • Constructors
    Constructor Description
    com.restfb.BinaryAttachment​(String, InputStream)
    use the stream-less API passing a byte[] for data
    com.restfb.BinaryAttachment​(String, InputStream, String)
    use the stream-less API passing a byte[] for data
    com.restfb.BinaryAttachment​(String, String, InputStream)
    use the stream-less API passing a byte[] for data
    com.restfb.BinaryAttachment​(String, String, InputStream, String)
    use the stream-less API passing a byte[] for data
    com.restfb.types.send.QuickReply()
    use QuickReply(QuickReplyType) with QuickReply.QuickReplyType.LOCATION as parameter instead
    com.restfb.types.send.QuickReply​(String, String, String)
    use constructor without contenttype instead. If using content type 'text' use QuickReply(String,String) for 'location' use QuickReply()
  • Enum Constants
    Enum Constant Description
    com.restfb.scope.FacebookPermissions.MANAGE_PAGES
    com.restfb.scope.FacebookPermissions.PUBLISH_ACTIONS
    this permission is deprecated and it is not possible to publish anything to the user feed via Graph API since April 2018
    com.restfb.scope.FacebookPermissions.PUBLISH_PAGES
    com.restfb.scope.FacebookPermissions.READ_CUSTOM_FRIENDLISTS
    since breaking change on 4 April, 2018
    com.restfb.scope.FacebookPermissions.READ_FRIENDLISTS
    not usable since Graph API 2.3, use READ_CUSTOM_FRIENDLISTS instead. If you use the Graph API before 2.3 ignore the deprecation warning

    since breaking change on 4 April, 2018
